name: autorender
description: After Effects auto-rendering application for SurfTheMusic

scripts.start:local: npm start & cd ./frontend && npm run start:local
scripts.start:local-mac: SKIP_CLEANUP=true BINARY=$(echo "/Applications/Adobe After Effects CC 2019/aerender") npm start & cd ./frontend && npm run start:local
scripts.start:local-mac-dev: SKIP_CLEANUP=true BINARY=$(echo "/Applications/Adobe After Effects CC 2019/aerender") npm start & cd ./frontend && npm run dev:local
scripts.sampleRender:mac: BINARY=$(echo "/Applications/Adobe After Effects CC 2019/aerender") node sampleRender.js

author: Aaron Baw
